name: TheFairyWeKnow
description:
A Duty was Bestowed upon A Fairy. she was to raise a baby. the baby would start with a balance nature of good and bad equal. in reality where the fairy has no power,  the baby will do things good or bad on his choice which will effect his good or bad bars. once the baby sleeps the fairy can teleport the baby to a dream or a nightmare where she has all the power to control the baby she can use the nightmare and dreams to keep balance between good and bad so the baby can get reality. once his reality is reached max. the fairy job is done. if the good or bad geet too low or too high the fairy losses the baby to and fails in her duty.

Will you help the fairy succeeds.

And Remember the Nightmares takes goodness and badness 
while the Dreams give them.

How To Play...
1. Use the fairy to do interactions. 
2.Input is mouse left and right button.
3.Goal is to make the baby reality bar reach its full, while stoping the good and bad bar from getting completely full or empty.
4. fairy has no power in reality.
5.fairy can control baby actions in dreams and nightmares.
6.when baby sleeps in reality fairy can teleport him into a dream or a nightmare. and when baby fell asleep there so the fairy can teleport him to reality.
7.Reality bar only increases in Reality. it cant be increased in a dream or nightmare. although with fairy misguiding the baby in nightmare may result in loss in reality bar.

so good luck raise the baby reality bar while maintaining a balance in good and bad bar through Dreams and Nightmares.
